description:
Reigen recieved a phone call at his office, the Spirits and Such Consultation Office. The client asked him to find out what the black shadow that kept destroying his fields actually was. Meanwhile, back at Salt Middle School, Kamuro announces that he`s going to resign from the position of student council president. Elections to decide a new studnet council president are going to be held and Mezato convinces Mob to run as a candidate, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ビリビリ ~誰かが見ている~
